briefdescription.para: Perform internal processing on HCI connection open.
Perform internal processing on HCI connection close.
Get a connection structure by handle.

simplesect.para: Pointer to connection structure or NULL if not found.

parameterdescription.para: WSF buffer containing an ACL packet.
Number of new buffers now available.

briefdescription.para: Send ACL packets, start of packet.

parameterdescription.para: WSF buffer containing an ACL packet.

briefdescription.para: Send ACL packets, continuation of fragmented packets.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to connection structure. If set non-NULL, then a fragment is sent from this connection structure. If NULL the function finds the next connection structure with a fragment to be sent.

simplesect.para: true if packet sent, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: This function is called from the HCI transport layer when transmission of an ACL packet is complete.

parameterdescription.para: WSF buffer containing an ACL packet.

simplesect.para: pointer to ACL packet to send, or NULL if no packet to send.

briefdescription.para: Check if a TX ACL packet is being fragmented.

simplesect.para: true if fragmenting a TX ACL packet, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Perform internal HCI processing of vendor specific HCI events.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to input HCI event parameter byte stream.

simplesect.para: HCI callback event code or zero.
